content.content: MatrisomeDB is a searchable database that integrates experimental proteomic data on the ECM composition normal and diseased tissues. It also provides live cross-referencing to gene and protein databases for every ECM and ECM-associated genes.
Citation: MatrisomeDB: the ECM-protein knowledge database. Shao X, Taha IN, Clauser KR, Gao Y, Naba A. Nucleic Acids Res. 2019 Oct 5. pii: gkz849.
